verses.text: Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, into the \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Zin|strong="H6790"\w* in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*; and \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* there, and was \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* there.

And there was no \w water|strong="H4325"\w* for the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*: and they \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* themselves together against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w chode|strong="H7378"\w* with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Would God \w that|strong="H3863"\w* we had \w died|strong="H1478"\w* when our \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w died|strong="H1478"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*!

And why have ye brought \w up|strong="H0935"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* into this \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, that we and our \w cattle|strong="H1165"\w* should \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there?

And wherefore have ye made us to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* us in unto this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*? it \add is\add* no \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, or of \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, or of \w vines|strong="H1612"\w*, or of \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w*; neither \add is\add* there any \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* from the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* upon their \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*: and the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto them.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and \w gather|strong="H6950"\w* thou the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* together, thou, and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* ye unto the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* before their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*; and it shall give \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* his \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, and thou shalt bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to them \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*: so thou shalt \w give|strong="H8248"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* and their \w beasts|strong="H1165"\w* \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, as he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6950"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* together \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* now, ye \w rebels|strong="H4784"\w*; must we \w fetch|strong="H3318"\w* you \w water|strong="H4325"\w* out of this \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*?

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and with his \w rod|strong="H4294"\w* he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w twice|strong="H6471"\w*: and the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H7227"\w*, and the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w drank|strong="H8354"\w*, and their \w beasts|strong="H1165"\w* \add also\add*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Because ye \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* me not, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* me in the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, therefore ye shall not \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* this \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them.

This \add  \+w is|strong="H1992"\+w*\add* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w*; because the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w strove|strong="H7378"\w* with the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and he was \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* in them.\f + \fr 20.13 \ft Meribah: that is, Strife\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* from \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w* unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* all the \w travail|strong="H8513"\w* that hath \w befallen|strong="H4672"\w* us:\f + \fr 20.14 \ft befallen…: Heb. found us\f*

How our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and we have \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* a \w long|strong="H7227"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*; and the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* \w vexed|strong="H7489"\w* us, and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*:

And when we \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* our \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w*, and hath brought us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and, behold, we \add are\add* in \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*, a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* in the \w uttermost|strong="H7097"\w* of thy \w border|strong="H1366"\w*:

Let us \w pass|strong="H5674"\w*, I pray thee, through thy \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: we will not \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* through the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, or through the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, neither will we \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add of\add* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w wells|strong="H0875"\w*: we will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* by the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \add high\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, we will not \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* nor to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, until we have \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* thy \w borders|strong="H1366"\w*.

And \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thou shalt not \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* by me, lest I come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* thee with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We will \w go|strong="H5927"\w* by the high \w way|strong="H4546"\w*: and if I and my \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of thy \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, then I will \w pay|strong="H5414"\w* for it: I will only, without \add doing\add* any \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \add else\add*, go \w through|strong="H5674"\w* on my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt not go \w through|strong="H5674"\w*. And \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* him with \w much|strong="H3515"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

Thus \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w passage|strong="H5674"\w* through his \w border|strong="H1366"\w*: wherefore \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5186"\w* from him.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Kadesh|strong="H6946"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*, by the \w coast|strong="H1366"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for he shall not \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because ye rebelled \w against|strong="H4784"\w* my \w word|strong="H6310"\w* at the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w Meribah|strong="H4809"\w*.\f + \fr 20.24 \ft word: Heb. mouth\f*

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and bring them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w*:

And \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* of his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w put|strong="H3847"\w* them upon \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \add unto his people\add*, and shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* there.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*: and they went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Hor|strong="H2023"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w stripped|strong="H6584"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* of his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w put|strong="H3847"\w* them upon \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* there in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* came \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*.

And when all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* was \w dead|strong="H1478"\w*, they \w mourned|strong="H1058"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
